title: Bitcoin Could Hit $200,000 by December 2025, Says Standard Chartered Bank
description: SCB analysts join Bloomberg in predicting a six-figure Bitcoin price.

title: BlackRock, ARK Invest, and Bitwise compete to offer low-cost access to Bitcoin
description: BlackRock, ARK Invest, VanEck and Bitwise compete to offer the lowest fees on their proposed SEC-approved Bitcoin ETFs.

title: Visa Adopts Web3 Tech for Its New Loyalty Engagement Solution
description: Visa, a worldwide leader in credit payment technology, has announced that it will include Web3 elements in its customized loyalty program solution. The company partnered with Smartmedia Technologies, a Web3 loyalty rewards startup, to add innovative features to these programs that include virtual worlds, digital wallets, and gamified rewards. Visa Turns to Web3 to Revitalize […]
